subject: Re: [junit] using httpuint to test opening another browser window
msgSnippet: On Thu, 13 Jan 2005 21:06:04 -0000, Jeff Schlaver ... The best place to look for examples is the test directory included in the distribution. Look especially
messageBody:
On Thu, 13 Jan 2005 21:06:04 -0000, Jeff Schlaver
<jeff.schlaver@...> wrote:
>
>
> We are having problems with using httpunit to test when links open
> up another browser session. we were able to get code to work on our
> help screen pop-up but other target links.
>
> Since I'm new to this I think I may have missed something, also can
> not seem to find any examples of code to use and modify.

The best place to look for examples is the test directory included in
the distribution. Look especially at
test/com/meterware/httpunit/WebWindowTest.java

The key is to note that any new windows will be found in your
WebConversation object and that you can register a WebWindowListener
to get notifications of window openings.
